code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import TaskItem from'./TaskItem';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TaskList=()=>{const[tasks,setTasks]=useState([]);const fetchTasks=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get('http://localhost:8000/api/tasks',{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(localStorage.getItem('token'))}});setTasks(response.data.tasks);}catch(error){console.log('error fetching tasks',error);}};useEffect(()=>{fetchTasks();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mt-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-xl font-bold mb-4",children:"Tasks"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-4",children:tasks.map(task=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TaskItem,{task:task,fetchTasks:fetchTasks},task._id))})]});};export default TaskList;
